long_description: When you're melting snow for drinking water or making a meal for a group of hungry backpackers, you'll be happy to have the large-volume 4.7 liter REI Campware cook pot along. Teflon(R) Classic coating provides excellent nonstick performance, making the post-meal cleanup a breeze. Lid includes strainer holes to make draining water simple; silicon thumb pads on the lid help you strain hot liquids without burning your hands. Stainless-steel wire handles snap up and down and are coated in heat-resistant silicon. Black exterior of the pot absorbs heat from your stove. Spiral pattern on the bottom of the REI Campware cook pot grips your stove or grill top. Includes a storage sack.
short_description: When you're melting snow for drinking water or making a meal for a group of hungry backpackers, you'll be happy to have the large-volume 4.7 liter REI Campware cook pot along.
